author: maraschmiedt6542
content:
Hi All, 

thanks for those of you who attended our community call last week. 

In the event you were not able to dial in or would like to revisit the discussion on 'SSV-based Staking Pools versus Single-Validator Staking Pools'  please find the link to the slide deck and recording here:

https://docs.google.com/presentation/u/1/d/1t2qkIRaQ76hBXCfTqTlZYV88868YIgiBCpXKHXSTA6c/edit?urp=gmail_link&gxids=7628#slide=id.g9bd7459738_3_0

https://drive.google.com/file/u/1/d/12a3rWtM6KbGIUExJpblTA59HnIXiRVPq/view?usp=sharing

As mentioned in the previous email, the upcoming series of SSV calls including the one from last week will comprise a discussion of the different use cases for the implementation. On the agenda for the next call: How SSV's can Improve Resiliency for Staking Providers and Institutional Infrastructure Setups.

If you have any comments, questions or would like to contribute to the effort please feel free to jump in the Discord.

Best wishes,
Mara
